classDiagram
    class Controls {
        +bool V9
        +bool V11
        +bool V19
        +bool V15
        +bool V21
        +float V10
        +float V17
        +float V20
        +float pump_hz

    class State {
        +float T5
        +float T6
        +float PT1
        +float PT3
        +float LT19
        +float LT23
        +float FT18
        +bool ready
        +str mode
    }
    class CryoCoolerSim {
        +step(dt, power_W)
        -_update_pressures(dt)
        -_update_temperatures(dt, power_W)
        -_update_levels(dt, power_W)
        -flow_loop_and_eff()
        -_flow_base()
        -_rsc()
        +T_boil(pt_bar)
        +clamp(v, lo, hi)
    }
    Controls --> CryoCoolerSim : injects
    State --> CryoCoolerSim : injects
    CryoCoolerSim --> State : updates
    CryoCoolerSim ..> Controls : updates heater
